description.plain:
Lesly Mess, or Afida Turner, is a french actress, host, singer, writer, composer, author and TV personality.

Lesly Mess debuted as a singer releasing a few singles and an album on an independent label in 1999 before becoming a host on MCM Africa. Meanwhile, she made her first steps actress appearing in series such as “H”, broadcast on Canal + before knowing fame through the reality-Tv show “Loft Story 2” in 2002 .

The same year, she released two singles “Pas Celle Que Tu Crois” and “Reste Au Paradis”, wrote a book “Mon Père A Tué Ma Mère” and proposed the following year, a second album named ‘'Roc Attitude’‘.

She decided to leave France to try her luck in the United States where she appeared in the The Black Eyed Peas' music video ‘Shut Up’ in 2004 before turning under her real name in several films such as ‘'Single Black Female’‘ alongside Farrah Franklin (ex-group Destiny’s Child), ’‘What Up’‘ and ’‘Shut Up And Shoot’‘.

She returned to music in 2011 when she published the single ‘Come With Me’, taken from her album ‘Paris-Hollywood, appearing in the movie “Visions Interdites” and appeared in the famous french cooking show “Un Diner Presque Parfait”.

body.plain:
Lesly Mess, or Afida Turner, is a french actress, host, singer, writer, composer, author and TV personality.

Lesly Mess debuted as a singer releasing a few singles and an album on an independent label in 1999 before becoming a host on MCM Africa. Meanwhile, she made her first steps actress appearing in series such as “H”, broadcast on Canal + before knowing fame through the reality-Tv show “Loft Story 2” in 2002 .

The same year, she released two singles “Pas Celle Que Tu Crois” and “Reste Au Paradis”, wrote a book “Mon Père A Tué Ma Mère” and proposed the following year, a second album named ‘'Roc Attitude’‘.

She decided to leave France to try her luck in the United States where she appeared in the The Black Eyed Peas' music video ‘Shut Up’ in 2004 before turning under her real name in several films such as ‘'Single Black Female’‘ alongside Farrah Franklin (ex-group Destiny’s Child), ’‘What Up’‘ and ’‘Shut Up And Shoot’‘.

She returned to music in 2011 when she published the single ‘Come With Me’, taken from her album ‘Paris-Hollywood, appearing in the movie “Visions Interdites” and appeared in the famous french cooking show “Un Diner Presque Parfait”.

annotatable.title: Born An Angel

songs.lyrics:
In the darkest night
When the sun won't shine
That is where I hide
From the love once mine

Your touch was so real
There was nothing I wanna do for you
When he's lost then I feel
Takes me over that I can't deny the truth

I was born an angel
Down on my knees
Lost that fight was temptation
Sweet misery
I was born an angel
My heart is weak
It's the curse on my name
Sure I can't break free

Oh Oh oh
Born an angel
Oh Oh Oh

Sweetest taste of blood
A siner in the dark
Took your spirit but
Forever hold me apart

Your touch was so real
There was nothing I wanna do for you
When he's lost then I feel
Takes me over that I can't deny the truth

I was born an angel
Down on my knees
Lost that fight was temptation
Sweet misery
I was born an angel
My heart is weak
It's the curse on my name
Sure I can't break free

Oh Oh oh
Born an angel
Oh Oh Oh

Your touch was so real
There was nothing I wanna do for you
When he's lost then I feel
Takes me over that I can't deny the truth

I was born an angel
Down on my knees
Lost that fight was temptation
Sweet misery
I was born an angel
My heart is weak
It's the curse on my name
Sure I can't break free

Oh Oh oh
Born an angel
Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh oh
Born an angel
Oh Oh Oh

Oh Oh oh
Born an angel
Oh Oh Oh

songs.embed_content: Read “Tu Mens” by Afida Turner on Genius
songs.recording_location: Studios De La Seine, Paris, France
songs.title: Tu Mens

songs.full_title: Love Theme from Spartacus by Terry Callier
songs.title: Love Theme from Spartacus

songs.lyrics:
Quoi,encore celui-là
Mais comment il ose se manifester?
Mais je rêve...que des mensonges
Hein...tu crois qu'c'est aussi simple
Tu crois que j'vais te téléphoner pour ta lettre
À deux balles là!mais c'est terminer j'ai perdu trop
D'energie avec ce mec
J'veux plus te voir degage !

Tu ecris qu'tu m'aime
Tu m'adore, t'es idées s'emmêlent
Dés qu'tu pose les yeux sur moi tes prunes
Elles tombent encore,tu dis que j'te rend fort
Tu préféres etres mort que d'etre loin de moi tu vois
J'y croyais encore ya cinq mois
J'croyais a ton barratin
Mais ta cruauté, ton vice m'ont atteint
M'ont brisé le cœur en deux
Même si de tes yeux les larmes ont tellement couler
Tu m'as tellement rouler que j'aurais voulu le voir
Pour le croire
Même dans le noir j'aurais pu savoir si t'es sincère
Être une femme sensible tu vois qu'sa sert
Même si j'suis touchée par ta letttre à ma gloire
Je n'suis plus ta bonne poire et je n'pourrais plus te
Croire

{Refrain:}
Tu mens !
Tu mens dans le noir même si
Tu ecris à ma gloire c'est mort
Tu mens !
Tu mens dans le noir même si
Tu ecris à ma gloire c'est mort
Tu mens!
Tu mens dans le noir même si
Tu ecris à ma gloire c'est mort
Tu mens !
Tu mens dans le noir même si
Tu ecris à ma gloire c'est mort

Comme un elixir, j'buvais tes paroles
Et pire j'm'en aventer, pour que mes desirs
Deviennent vite réalité
Aujourd'hui, tu dis regretter, tu dis que je suis celle
Qu'il te faut .Celle qui te foudroye de mon
Tempérament de feu! 120.000 volt concentré d'energie
En moi une certaine synergie entre nous qui fait
Croire qu'ont peut faire fonder une famille et voir
L'avenir en rose.Donc ose tu oses même m'en mettre une
Bonne dose, utilise pas toute ta prose
Même pour moi tu t'es déjà trop foutu de moi
À me voir couper court ta super tchatche à ma gloire

{au Refrain, x2}

Tu mens!..........
Tu mens!................
Tu mens!

description.plain:
1st single from the singer ‘'Afida Turner’‘.
Only available on digital download.
The cover of the single ’‘Come With Me’‘ is the same as the album ’‘Paris-Hollywood’‘.

songs.title: Come With Me

annotatable.link_title: Come With Me by Afida Turner
annotatable.title: Come With Me

body.plain:
1st single from the singer ‘'Afida Turner’‘.
Only available on digital download.
The cover of the single ’‘Come With Me’‘ is the same as the album ’‘Paris-Hollywood’‘.

songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Come with me (With me)
Let's go, right now (Let's go, right now)
I need you next to me
So hot, so fine (So hot, so fine)
You always set me free

[Pre-Chorus]
Close your eyes, feel it inside
Let the music guide your way
Close your eyes, you look so fine
Here is where I wanna stay

[Chorus]
That's how I feel when you're around
Please stay and dance forever
I need to know you'll never leave
I won't resist if you still do

That's how I feel when you're around
Please stay and dance forever
I need to know you'll never leave
I won't resist if you still do

[Bridge]
Don't break my heart, it's not up still
I'm burning for you
You seem too good to be for real
Yeah you make my dreams come true
Don't break my heart, it's not up still
I'm burning for you
You seem too good to be for real
Yeah you make my dreams come true
My dreams come true
My dreams come true

[Chorus]
That's how I feel when you're around (My dreams come true)
Please stay and dance forever (My dreams come true)
I need to know you'll never leave
I won't resist if you still do

That's how I feel when you're around
Please stay and dance forever
I need to know you'll never leave
I won't resist if you still do
